expected-result.ddl: drop table if exists prod_group; create table prod_group \( id integer\({0}\) not null, name char\({1}\), primary key \( id \) \); drop table if exists prod; create table prod \( id integer\({0}\) not null, name char\({1}\), group_id integer\({0}\), primary key \( id \) \);
alter table prod add constraint prod_group foreign key prod_group \(group_id \) references prod_group \(id \) ;
